name: WPRunway for Divi
author: François Yerg

sections.description:
WPRunway for Divi enhance your website with powerfuls and useful new modules and features.

Check the demos and documentation

Note: Divi Website builder is required for this plugin.

Runway for Divi provides new modules:

  • Alert – Display alert messages to your visitors.
  • Note – Show notes in your pages or posts.
  • Reading time – Let your visitors know how long it takes to read a post or page.
  • Tag – Insert a tag at the biginning, midle or end of a sentence.

SUPPORT

Need help? Click here!
sections.installation:
Note: This plugin works with Divi. Make sure you have Divi Theme installed and activated.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/exclusivedivimodules directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Exclusive Divi option, will appear in the dashboard.
sections.faq:
Can we use modules in theme builder?

Yes, you can use every modules inside Divi theme builder.

How to disable specific modules?

You can disable any module from your WordPress Dashboard > Runway for Divi > Modules tab.
